 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְטָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְטָה‎</span> **verb** ==reach, attain== (Targam ***id.***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare Christian-Palestinian Aramaic [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 108</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (for <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl (1886), 736</sup>; distinct from Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָצָא‎</span>, etc., q. v.); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְטָא‎</span> [[Dan.4.25|Dan 4:25]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ָ  ה‎</span> [[Dan.7.13|Dan 7:13]]; [[Dan.7.22|Dan 7:22]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְטַת‎</span> [[Dan.4.19|Dan 4:19]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְטָת‎</span> v.[[Dan.4.21|Dan 4:21]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]], erroneous, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מטית‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 47, Beisp. 1</sup>) ***a***)); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְטוֺ‎</span> [[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יִמְטֵא‎</span> [[Dan.4.8|Dan 4:8]]; [[Dan.4.17|Dan 4:17]] — 

**1. a.** ***reach, come to*** [[Dan.6.25|Dan 6:25]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> location); ***come*** unto, as far as [[Dan.7.13|Dan 7:13]] (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַד‎</span> person); absolute ***arrive*** [[Dan.7.22|Dan 7:22]] (of time; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐδόθη</span>; see [[BDB#Nes|Nes]]<sup>MM 41</sup> who compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV. ***give***). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***reach, extend***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ל‎</span> location [[Dan.4.8|Dan 4:8]]; [[Dan.4.17|Dan 4:17]]; [[Dan.4.19|Dan 4:19]]. 

**2.** with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַל‎</span> person ***come upon, befall*** [[Dan.4.21|Dan 4:21]]; [[Dan.4.25|Dan 4:25]].
